bibl.title: Garrison Life at Vindolanda. A Band of Brothers.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Batavians and Tungrians. - 3. Vindolanda. - 4. Tungrians, Batavians and Tungrians again. - 5. Military Routine. - 6. The Soldiers. - 7. The Officers and Their Families. - 8. Epilogue. - Notes. Abbreviations and Bibliography. Index.
BIRLEY Anthony, Garrison Life at Vindolanda. A Band of Brothers.
Stroud, Tempus, 2002, 8°, 192 pp., 121 figg. n./bl. et 30 figg. coul. ISBN 0-7524-1950-1. £15.99.
